body_html:
Well, my issue went away after changing https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py#L483 from

if all_model_checkpoint_paths is None:

to

if all_model_checkpoint_paths is None or len(all_model_checkpoint_paths) == 0:

But it's more of a workaround than a proper fix. Still, should I make a PR?
body:
Well, my issue went away after changing https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py#L483 from

```
if all_model_checkpoint_paths is None:
```

to 

```
if all_model_checkpoint_paths is None or len(all_model_checkpoint_paths) == 0:
```

But it's more of a workaround than a proper fix. Still, should I make a PR?
